v1.about:
I help product-led SaaS teams grow from $1M to $20M ARR by turning Frankenstein UX into delightful product experiences that convert.

You do not have a designer, and your dev team has been shipping features for years, but without a design system or UX oversight the product has started to feel inconsistent and confusing.

The result?
A Frankenstein UX that slows growth, frustrates users, and makes onboarding harder than it should be.

I know this struggle because I used to be a developer. I saw first-hand how design bottlenecks, low adoption, and poor onboarding hold back great products.

That is why I started Love at First Try, a in-house-design-team-as-a-service in the top 5 for bootstrapped SaaS teams.
